section.p: Information regarding the EMS crew's response to dispatch

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:11407 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.3"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10573)/@code="67664-3" EMS response Narrative NEMSIS (CodeSystem: ) (CONF:10572)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title which SHOULD equal "EMS Response" (CONF:10575)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry such that it (CONF:10995)
Conforms to Delay Organizer (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.95)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry such that it (CONF:10997)
Conforms to Dispatch Location Organizer (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.96)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry such that it (CONF:10999)
Conforms to Response Odometer Reading Organizer (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.97)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry such that it (CONF:11001)
Conforms to Response Mode To Scene (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.182)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10573)/@code="67664-3" EMS response Narrative NEMSIS (CodeSystem: ) (CONF:10572)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title which SHOULD equal "EMS Response" (CONF:10575)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry such that it (CONF:10995)
Conforms to Delay Organizer (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.95)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry such that it (CONF:10997)
Conforms to Dispatch Location Organizer (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.96)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry such that it (CONF:10999)
Conforms to Response Odometer Reading Organizer (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.97)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry such that it (CONF:11001)
Conforms to Response Mode To Scene (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.182)

body.codeblock: <section> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.3"/> <code code="67664-3" displayName="EMS response Narrative NEMSIS"/> <title>EMS Response</title> <text/> </section>
